thread.title: Thrill of a lifetime skeleton experience, Innsbruck, Austria: December 5 to 7 2015
thread.title_full: Thrill of a lifetime skeleton experience, Innsbruck, Austria: December 5 to 7 2015 - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Thrill of a lifetime skeleton experience, Innsbruck, Austria: December 5 to 7 2015
text: Ultimate adrenalin rush Innsbruck, Austria, December 5 to 7 From £1840 Hosted by Olympian Amy Williams Only 24 spaces available Hurtling down a specially prepared ice chute lying face down on a sled not much longer or wider than a tea tray is one of the most thrilling things you can do… ever. Telegraph Ski and Snowboard editor Henry Druce experienced the adrenalin rush of skeleton last season with Amy and was so impressed that we have decided to offer Telegraph Ski and Snowboard readers the opportunity to try it themselves. Olympian Amy Williams will be on hand to give expert guidance to the 24 participants, who can expect to go at up to 100kph down the 1232m track, which is at the Olympic Sliding Centre just outside Innsbruck. Before going full pelt on a skeleton, there will be a number of practice runs, and you’ll experience the full length of the track as a passenger in a four-man race bobsleigh. On this adrenalin rush weekend break with specialist operator Momentum Ski you’ll stay in luxury at Innsbruck’s only five-star hotel, the Grand Hotel Europa, and enjoy two top-quality dinners – the first at the hotel, the second at one of Innsbruck’s excellent restaurants, where Amy will round off the trip with an awards ceremony. Amy Williams at the Olympic Sliding Centre in Innsbruck, with 12 photobombers Price includes: • Transfers to and from Innsbruck airport • Welcome reception and briefing from Amy Williams • Welcome dinner • Expert tuition from Amy Williams • Up to three practice runs from the Kreisel start, two-thirds of the way up the course • A ride in a four-man race bobsleigh down the full length of the track • Up to three goes on a skeleton from the Damenstart, just a couple of hundred metres from the top of the track • Two fine dining dinners • Awards ceremony To book or for more information call Momentum Ski on 020 7371 9111 or email jessica@momentumski.com More reader holidays • Luxury getaway: St Anton, Austria • End of season blast: Val d'Isère, France Follow @telegraphtravel
